description: Aspose.Cells for .NET is a spreadsheet programming component that allows software developers to manipulate and convert spreadsheet files from within their own applications. A combination of APIs and GUI controls, Aspose.Cells for .NET speeds up Microsoft Excel programming and conversion.
releaseNotes:
New Features
40519 - Conditional formatting - Include DataBar type’s missing fields
40520 - Conditional formatting - Include IconSet type’s missing values
40521 - Conditional formatting - Support FormatConditionValueType.AutomaticMin/AutomaticMax
40593 - Read conditional formatting rules with cross-sheet formulas
40877 - Support Cells.MinDataColumn and Cells.MinDataRow properties
40954 - Support Cell Background Colors with Conditional Formatting (MS Excel 2010)
40773 - Data Filters of the PivotTable are supported
40856 - Advanced data validation of MS Excel 2010 is supported
 
Enhancements
40923 - Throws CellsException when changing the part of the array formula
40815 - Marker types and styles in the charts of Excel 2007/2010
40918 - Custom Marker shapes in the chart
40919 - How to create custom Markers
40808 - Sub-Charts are not accessible
40900 - AutoShapes in HTML Output
40688 - DataBars - Conditional formatting in PivotTable
40664 - Losing web queries in MS Excel 2007 formats
40677 - Manage external data ranges and their properties
40883 - MS Excel’s XLSB file size Issue
 
Exceptions
40880 - The static method CellsHelper.DetectFileFormat() throws exception
40926 - Looking for a solution in Aspose.Cells
40962 - Exception: “Index was out of range”
40884 - Loading workbook throws: 'Input string was not in a correct format'
40893 - Shape to image Error in Excel to PDF feature
 
Bugs
40876 - Image’s color mode formatting is not kept when saving an Excel file
40886 - MS Excel 2003 Worksheet’s Custom Properties corrupted
40924 - BUG in calculating Formulas
40937 - Opening and saving a file with conditional formatting failed
40963 - Bold style is not seen on ListObject’s header cell
40911 - Series markers issue
40932 - Quotes in the saved Tab Delimited file
40949 - CSV read/write does not 'round trip' for some inputs
40868 - StringValue returns a wrong value
40833 - 2 small issues with CELL function’s implementation
40850 - Issues with CELL function
40862 - GETPIVOTDATA formula calculation issue
40874 - PPMT formula is causing file recovery after calling Workook.CalculateFormula() method
40890 - Issue with IFERROR and VLOOKUP combination
40967 - COUNTIFS formula does not evaluate correct value
40975 - OFFSET function calculation issues
40976 - MODE function calculation issues
40977 - CELL function calculation issues
40978 - VLOOKUP function’s bug
40981 - TRIM function calculation issues
40581 - Save as HTML shows hidden column in the output
40771 - Saving clears formatting
40846 - Graphics in HTML output
40969 - HTML formatting issues (regarding extra borders)
40694 - SheetRender’s XPS and custom number format issue
40251 - Save as PDF does not preserve formatting
40751 - Problems with XLSX formatting in Excel and PDF outputs
40775 - Excel’s pivot table rendered to PDF is not correct
40811 - Custom fonts in PDF
40858 - Cell’s Vertical Alignment rendering issue
40896 - Text missing in the right-most end
40972 - Some conditional formattings are not rendered correctly
40871 - Problem with formatting in the Total Row in the PivotTable
40875 - Office for Mac-Os 2k11 crashes after opening an Excel file
40940 - Why is this code failing?
40951 - PivotTable’s calculated field getting changed
40952 - Problem saving Workbook with Calculated Members
40955 - Compact Layout for pivot table
40968 - Corrupt File when Refreshing Pivot Tables
40980 - ChangeDataSource() is broken
40601 - SheetRender draws textbox contents bold
40902 - Excel text box is resized incorrectly when rendering to image
40914 - SheetRender exports shape incorrectly
summary: Aspose.Cells for .Net is a class library for Excel document processing
title: Aspose.Cells for .NET
